column4: does anyone here use a cellphone for their internet connection. mine is too slow. about 1MB traffic in a hour. :/
I used to use a cell phone to connect to the net, it was about 56k speed...like 4-5kB/sec
but then i realized later that it was costing me a penny per kB, i found out i had an 800$ phone bill ! :( :(
i can connect to irc but thats it. have ping with 78% packet loss. how do i check the speed?
download a file...
command?
will try wget...
use ur web browser, or just install a package
yea or that..
78% packet loss...thats not good, i'm guessing weak signal
host not found in browser. can ping google.com.
so you can ping or can't ?
whats your ping time? you're probably timing out on file request
checking...
why won't they? damn them
adobe <<< macromedia
ping time=783ms. packet loss is 16% now.
whew
Scorp, i'd search for settings on your phone that could improve data speeds
